Detailed Description

The settings and operations on the board.

Member Function Documentation

def Board::Board::__init__ (   self,
  rows,
  cols,
  numBombs,
  width,
  height 
)

initiate the board

set up the size of the board, number of rows and colums, that split the cells in the board, and load each picture that need to be on the board. Then set the inital win/lose state to the board

Parameters:
rows the number value of the row
cols the number value of the column
numBombs the number value of the bombs
width the width of the cell
height the height of the cell

def Board::Board::depressNeighbors (   self,
  r,
  c 
)

depress the neighbors

depress the blank neighbors

Parameters:
i row number of the cell while if it is uncovered, the process will pass that certain cell.
j column number of the cell

def Board::Board::getNumBombNeighbors (   self,
  i,
  j 
)

get the number of neighboring bombs

count the number of neighboring bombs from cell to cell

Parameters:
i the current row number
j the current cloumn number
Returns:
the value of the number of bombs

def Board::Board::getNumFlagNeighbors (   self,
  i,
  j 
)

get the number of flagged neighbors

record the numberof flagged neighbors and outpt the number

Parameters:
i row number of the cell
j column number of the cell
Returns:
the number of flagged neighbors

def Board::Board::isCell (   self,
  col,
  row 
)

return the row number and column number of the cell

return the row number and column number of the cell

Parameters:
row row number of the cell
col column number of the cell

def Board::Board::leftClick (   self,
  r,
  c 
)

set the behavior of left click

set the behavior of the left click, if the cell is covered by the bomb, the game will end when the cell is clicked. If there is not a bomb, then the cell will refresh and to be uncover, and probably show the neighboring cells

Parameters:
r row number of the cell
c column number of the cell

def Board::Board::looseGame (   self  ) 

transfer the reset button to the lose face

transfer the reset button to the lose face and play the lose sound

def Board::Board::refreshCells (   self  ) 

refresh the cell

refresh the cell to the matching presets while the cell is clicked. If the cell does not contain the bomb, the chain of neighboring cell will also to be refreshing, until there are bombs nearby.

def Board::Board::rightAndLeftClick (   self,
  r,
  c 
)

set the behavior when right and left click

if the correct number of bomb is correctly flagged, then the neighboring cells will automatically uncover when left and right click, otherwise the game will lose. When all the cells are uncovered, the game will turn into winning animation

Parameters:
r row number of the cell
c column number of the cell

def Board::Board::rightClick (   self,
  r,
  c 
)

set the behavior of right click

set the behavior of the right click, if the cell is unflagged, then do the flag action. If the cell is currently flagged, then do the unflag action

Parameters:
r row number of the cell
c column number of the cell

def Board::Board::unlockNeighbors (   self,
  currentCell 
)

unlock the neighboring cells

uncover the neighboring cells while there is not a bomb nearby.

Parameters:
currentCell the current cell to be clicked

def Board::Board::winGame (   self  ) 

transfer the reset button to the smile face

transfer the reset button to the smile face and play the winning sound
